TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActionBlock`1<TInput> extends System.Object implements class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1<!TInput>

generic <typename TInput> public ref class ActionBlock sealed : System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<TInput>

typeparam.span: 此 操作的数据类型。

summary.span: 提供数据流块，其调用为每个接收的数据提供的 委托。

span.span: Provides a dataflow block that invokes a provided delegate for every data element received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [tpl-install-instructions](~/includes/tpl-install-instructions.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来执行多个使用数据流块的计算，并返回执行计算所需的时间。The following example shows the use of the class to perform several computations using dataflow blocks, and returns the elapsed time required to perform the computations. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分[如何： 在数据流块中指定 Degree of Parallelism](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete() cil managed
abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

summary.span: 通知数据流块，告知其不应再接受或生成更多消息也不应再使用更多的延迟消息。

span.span: Signals to the dataflow block that it shouldn't accept or produce any more messages and shouldn't consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后已被调用数据流块，该块将完成 (以便其任务将进入最终状态) 后它已处理所有以前可用的数据。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete (so that its task will enter a final state) after it has processed all previously available data. 此方法不会阻止等待完成发生，但将发起的请求。This method will not block waiting for completion to occur, but will initiate the request. 若要等待完成发生，请使用属性。To wait for completion to occur, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法，它不应接受或生成更多消息也不使用任何更多的延迟消息到数据流块发送信号。The following example shows the use of the method to signal to the dataflow block that it shouldn't accept or produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages . 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分[如何： 在数据流块中指定 Degree of Parallelism](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示数据流块的异步操作和完成。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The completed task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块被视为已完成，它当前不在处理一条消息，当保证它不会处理更多消息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 返回相关联的块已完成时，将转换为已完成状态。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 它将转换为状态时阻止完成其处理成功根据数据流块定义的语义。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics. 它将转换为状态时数据流块已完成处理过早地由于未经处理的异常，并将转换为数据流块已完成之后过早地处理时的状态收到取消请求。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely after receiving a cancellation request. 如果任务完成时处于状态，其`Exception`属性返回包含导致失败的块的一个或多个异常的异常。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property returns an exception that contains one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性时要等待的所有消息通过网络传播。The following example shows how to use the property to wait for all messages to propagate through the network. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分[如何： 在数据流块中指定 Degree of Parallelism](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取等待被此代码块处理的输入项的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.

value.span: 等待被此代码块处理的输入项的数目。

span.span: The number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包括当前正在处理由块的任何项目或已处理由块的任何项目。The does not include any items that are currently being processed by the block or any items that have already been processed by the block.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以发布到目标数据流块的项。The following example shows how to use the method to post an item to the target dataflow block. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分[如何： 在数据流块中指定 Degree of Parallelism](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

span.span: The exception that caused the faulting.

summary.span: 导致数据流块在出错的状态下完成。

span.span: Causes the dataflow block to complete in a faulted state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之后已被调用数据流块，该块将完成并将其任务将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete and its task will enter a final state. 在出错块，作为与取消块，缓冲将导致消息 （未处理的输入的消息，以及 unoffered 的输出消息） 会丢失。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 提供信息至数据流块，并提供使用或延迟信息的机会。

span.span: Offers a message to the dataflow block, and gives it the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
The status of the offered message.

returns.span: 如果消息为该目标接受，则将返回 ，将返回，并且源不应再使用提供的消息，因为其现在归目标所有。

span.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target.

returns.span: 如果消息因该目标延迟，则将以通知的形式返回 ，该通知是目标稍后可能会尝试使用或保留消息的通知；同时，源仍拥有消息并将其提供给其他块。

span.span: If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.

returns.span: 如果目标推迟了消息，而源为 ，则返回 。

span.span: If the target would have otherwise postponed message, but source was , is returned.

returns.span: 如果尝试了接受此则消息但由于将消息交付给另一目标或放弃该消息的源而错过该消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目标选择不接受消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned.

returns.span: 如果源选择不接受该消息并将从不从此源接受另一则消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
is not valid.
